snippet.title: SAMUDRA | Game Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
SAMUDRA is an atmospheric visual experience with no dialogues/ text,
with simple control and icons serving as the only guiding hands
throughout this dreamlike trip. This game can be experienced by anyone
regardless of their age & spoken language.

Experience an interactive & puzzle filled game-play revolving the
elements of Light & Darkness, Sea Pollution, Nature VS Corporate,
there are easter eggs to be hunted and secrets to be uncovered.

#samudragame #khayalanarts #indiegame #artgame #ouroceanourlegacy
#oceanpolution #karyaanakbangsa
